sections.content: To begin pre-curation, follow the workflow to determine if the gene/entity is listed in ClinGen. Use sources such as GenCC and OMIM for additional information. Refer to the lumping and splitting criteria below to guide your decisions.
Apply the ClinGen group and points after reviewing the entry. Review GenCC and OMIM for unlisted genes/entities.

- Only one disease entity asserted in literature.
- No molecular mechanism difference observed.
- Intrafamilial variability pronounced.
- Disease entities are part of a variable phenotype in a single organ system.

- More than one distinct disease entity asserted in literature.
- Distinguishable molecular mechanisms.
- Different inheritance patterns with varying phenotypes.
